title: Needs Hierarchy Model-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Transitioning to Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Project-based learning design capacity building for pre-service/in-service language teachers to support remote education transitions in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Apply the hierarchy of needs model to design effective remote instruction under constraints at least three times
Develop at least one customized remote language instruction scenario based on target learner analysis
Propose improvements for remote education designs incorporating peer feedback through project-based assessment

resources: Online Collaboration Tools (Google Workspace, Padlet, etc.)
Access to Universal Remote Education Platform (LMS)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
